name: Progressive Muscle Relaxation
description: A technique involving tensing and then relaxing different muscle groups to reduce physical tension before bed.
benefits: Lowers physical stress, Eases the transition to sleep, Improves sleep quality
implementation_steps: Start with your feet and work your way up to your face, Tense each muscle group for 5 seconds, then relax for 30 seconds, Repeat as needed until you feel relaxed

name: Consistent Sleep Schedule
description: Going to bed and waking up at the same time every day, even on weekends, to regulate your body's internal clock.
benefits: Improves sleep quality, Reduces time taken to fall asleep, Increases daytime alertness
implementation_steps: Determine a sleep schedule that allows for 7-9 hours of sleep, Use reminders to start winding down 1 hour before bed, Avoid sleeping in, even after a late night
